datasets.name: dataset1
queryLines:
SELECT  published_at,
        YEAR(DATE(published_at)) AS published_at_year,
        CONCAT(YEAR(DATE(published_at)), '-', LPAD(MONTH(DATE(published_at)), 2, '0')) AS published_at_year_month,
        MONTH(DATE(published_at)) AS published_at_month,
        DATE(published_at) AS published_at_date,
        title,
        description,
        body,
        language,
        name as author,
        image,

        categories,
        topics,
        topics.name as topics_name,
        industries,
        entities,
        
        source.domain,
        source.home_page_url,
        source.location.country_name,
        source.location.country_code,

        summary,
        keywords,
        links,
        media,
        
        is_breaking,
        sentences_count,
        paragraphs_count,
        words_count,
        characters_count,

        ai_language,
        ai_summary,
        ai_country,
        ai_city,
        ai_latitude,
        ai_longitude,

        getdata_timestamp,
        eh_enqueued_timestamp,
        etl_processed_timestamp
FROM    dad_open_data.news.eventhub_clean_ai
